interactions.text: Privet ! Me no cheating, me training whole life to serve motherland.

choices.value: You seem to be defensive. Why are you stressed ?
Why did you participate in these olympic games ?
Do you have information about potential cheaters during the event ?

interactions.text: I'm not stressed ! You have no right to accuse me ! I passed all the anti-doping tests. Russia have always been honest. Not like other countries...

choices.value: What do you mean ? You think other countries are dishonest ?

interactions.text: Me had no choice. I have always been good at cycling. I was convinced to represent my country.

choices.value: What would happen to you if you came home without a medal ?

interactions.text: Yes, I'm convinced The Netherlands cheated. How could they beat me otherwise ?

choices.value: Do you have any evidence for these accusations ?

interactions.text: Of course they are ! They're jealous they can't compete with us ! They have to cheat to beat us it's obvious. There is no way The Netherlands beat us without cheating. I'm 100% sure they took drugs or something.
I... I'd rather not think about that.
What ?! You think I'm a liar ?? You want me to punch you in the face ?
